verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2232>gives<s%> <S%H2232>birth<s%> and <S%H3205>bears<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> [child], then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5079>menstruation<s%> <S%H1738><s%> she shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
'And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

'Then she shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of [her] <S%H2893>purification<s%> for thirty-three <S%H3117>days;<s%> she shall not <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> <S%H6944>thing,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purification<s%> are <S%H4390>completed.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H3205>bears<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> [child], then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for two <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> as in her <S%H5079>menstruation;<s%> and she shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of [her] <S%H2893>purification<s%> for sixty-six <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purification<s%> are <S%H4390>completed,<s%> for a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> she shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> a one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeon<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'Then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her; and she shall be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H4726>flow<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for her who <S%H3205>bears<s%> [a child, whether] a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5347>female.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>afford<s%> <S%H3027><s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then she shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for her, and she shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> ' "
